message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $110. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $95. Can you see if you can do that for me?
I'm getting closer to your target price, Bob! I can offer the product to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm getting closer to my target, but I still think I can do better. Can you meet me at $98?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $102. It's my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $95?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think $102 is a fair price considering the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my original offer. I can offer the product to you for $101. This is my final offer.

I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $120, but I'll make one last offer to you. Can you meet me at $97?
